title: Partying with Patel!
itunes:title: Partying with Patel!
description: This week on The Cigar Authority we're joined by cigarlebrity Rocky Patel from Rocky Patel Premium Cigars to talk about his old AND new cigars, and light up all four of his vintage cigars! We also bring on Fred Smith who is about to break the World Record in a sport that requires you to sit down! Plus we bring you all the latest news and events, and the introduction to the all new Cigar Authority website!
